title: Char Restaurant Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203357im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CoreysFinal_4459.jpg)

What typeface is “Char” written in? Thanks in advance!

 [‹ TYPE ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203357/http:/typophile.com/node/50750 "Go to previous forum topic") [TSS.TWLOHA ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203357/http:/typophile.com/node/50749 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bowser

comments.content: sorry for the enormous pic. i tried shrinking it in PS but it wouldnt allow me upload it here...it became very frustrating....
Amateur custom drawn or a free font I guess.
it is altered...i know the R was stretched up...but i think it came from somewhere...maybe the same typeface that STEAKHOUSE is drawn in...thats not an amateur drawing is it?
